overview: Just moments before his third wedding, Zahedi relates with utter sincerity and astonishing candor his obsession with prostitutes. He retraces his romantic and sexual history, including his ideological commitment to open relationships, that led to two disastrous marriages and several very pissed off ex-girlfriends.
cast: Caveh Zahedi|Rebecca Lord|Valentine Fillol-Cordier|Alexandra Guerineaud|Anastasia Gershman
